ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates a chart with three line-series and a Logarithmic Y-Axis
ExampleDefinition.Description:
This example demonstrates X or Y logarithmic axis in SciChart. Click the controls to change state. None= linear axes, Y-Axis and X-Axis set the respective axes to logarithmic or linear.
[b][i]Example Usage[/i][/b]
- Drag to zoom - Double click to zoom to extents - Change the Logarithmic Base from Log10, to LogE to Log2
[b][i]Tips![/i][/b]
The axis labels may be formatted using Scientific notation with Superscript. See the NumericAxis.ScientificNotation property in the help file.
